help.title: Need help?
help.subtitle: Browse docs and AI tips for faster answers.
help.tip: Tip: Ask the AI tab for summaries, anomalies, and next steps.
help.fallbackBody: No help is available for this page yet.

timesheets.title: Timesheets help
timesheets.intro: Quick tips for managing calendar entries and travel visibility.

bullets.switchViews: Switch between Month, Week, and List views from the toolbar.
bullets.createEdit: Click a day to add an entry; click an entry to edit.
bullets.scope: Managers can toggle Mine / Others / All in the header.

bullets.indicators: Travel indicators appear on calendar days with trips.
bullets.listView: In list views, click the ✈ travel line to see details.

bullets.alerts: Alerts highlight AI flags and policy issues.
bullets.weekly: Weekly breakdown is available in Week view.
bullets.filters: Use the daily hours cap chip to filter overages.

bullets.chat: Ask for summaries of flagged entries or trends.
bullets.suggestions: Use suggestion chips to start a question.

bullets.dragRange: Select and drag a time range to create entries across multiple days/hours.
bullets.aiDrafts: Ask AI to generate draft entries for a selected date range (you review before saving).

timesheetsReports.title: Timesheet reports
timesheetsReports.intro: Use reports to analyze hours, costs, and activity by project, task, and technician.

bullets.dateRange: Use the date range to focus on a specific period.
bullets.projectTask: Filter by project and task to drill into specific work.
bullets.technicianScope: Switch scope (mine / others / all) if you have permissions.

bullets.grouping: Group results by project, task, technician, or day to spot patterns.
bullets.totals: Review totals to validate expected hours and compare periods.
bullets.readResults: Click rows to inspect details before taking action.

bullets.downloads: Export the current view for sharing or offline review.
bullets.share: Use consistent filters before sharing results with the team.

bullets.questions: Ask AI questions like “why did hours spike last week?”.
bullets.summaries: Ask AI to summarize key insights and anomalies from the report.

ai.title: Ask TimePerk AI
ai.subtitle: Summarize anomalies, approvals, and trends.
ai.placeholderResponse: I'm still learning. For now, I can summarize the report based on your question.
ai.errorFallback: Something went wrong. Please try again.
ai.addonNotice: AI is available as an add-on for your plan.
ai.disabledMessage: Enable AI in tenant billing settings to continue.
ai.disabledTenant: AI is disabled for this tenant.
ai.unavailable: AI is not available for this tenant.
ai.enabledNotice: Ask a question to generate insights.

reports.aiIntro: Ask about this report or pick a suggestion to start.
reports.noInsights: No insights yet. Run the report to populate insights.

timesheets.aiAvailableBody: {{count}} entries were flagged and are ready for review.

caOt2.title: OT2 threshold reached
caOt2.noDays: No days exceeded the OT2 threshold.

timesheets.weeklyOnlyInWeek: Weekly breakdown is available in Week view.

alerts.aiAlertsAvailableInInsights: AI alerts are available inside Insights.

insights.weeklyBreakdownAvailableInWeekView: Weekly breakdown is available in Week view.

insights.summaryHint: Quick summary of top contributors and peak combinations.

suggestions.topProjects: Which project had the most hours?

insights.summaryHint: Overview of pending volume and busiest days.
